job_position: Business Development and HR analyst Internship
job_description: Using advanced job searching software to analyze potential target companies/ candidates Helping develop reports and analyses of potential customer Identify, analyze, and interpret HK market hiring trends  Processing confidential data and information according to guidelines.  Managing master data, including creation, updates, and deletion.  Managing users and user roles in HKIP Platform    Provide quality assurance of imported data, working with quality assurance analysts if necessary.  Generating HK Hiring reports from single or multiple systems.  Troubleshooting the reporting database environment and reports.
cover letter:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am excited to apply for the Business Development and HR analyst Internship at Hong Kong Inclusion Platform Limited. As a data science student with hands-on experience in AI development, data analytics, and software engineering, I am eager to bring my technical expertise and problem-solving mindset to your team.

My experience spans across AI-driven projects and data analytics roles. During my internship at Resume Page Limited, I developed an AI-powered profile chatbot using Llama and MySQL, improving user engagement by 35%. I also engineered a business card scanner with face recognition, streamlining information exchange by 30%. My prior data analyst internship at IESHER involved analyzing World Bank data to identify policy insights, reinforcing my ability to extract meaningful narratives from complex datasets.

Beyond technical expertise, I am passionate about building impactful solutions. My recent smart fridge platform, developed for a hackathon, integrates inventory tracking with AI-powered recipe recommendations and shopping list generation—demonstrating my ability to merge AI with real-world applications. My leadership experience in tutoring and mentoring has further sharpened my communication and collaboration skills.

I am eager to contribute my analytical skills and AI-driven mindset to Hong Kong Inclusion Platform Limited. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your team’s goals. Thank you for your time, and I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Christopher Otniel Eleazar

job_description:
This will be a structured internship program which gives interns a step -by-step  guidance and learning journey on games development and data analytics. Interns will  get the opportunity to design and develop competitive games with Unity, receive  feedback fro m neuropsychologist professor, interact with game players, and complete  games which will be launched on this engaging platform. Meanwhile, interns will get  the opportunity to co -publish an academic paper together with our neuropsychologist  professor on the  relationship between BrainChamp games and neuropsychology.

Job Responsibilities:
• Design and develop the logic for a web -based game  
• Set up end to end game flow from launching on the platform to exporting  metadata for neuropsychological assessment  
• Optimize performance and player experience  
• Work closely with the UI designer to implement/improve visual and animations  
• Work with neuropsychologist professor to analyze games -related data and co - 
publish an academic paper on the relationship between Brain Champ games and  
neuropsychology  

Job Requirements:
• Priority will be given to candidates who demonstrate eagerness to step out of  comfort zone and learn new skills  
• Candidates with knowledge of any programming language(s) are preferred

job_description:
Job Description: 
• Apply data analysis, modeling, machine learning, to design and develop realtime algorithmic trading models 
• Build, enhance and support research and trading tools 
• Assist in research and backtest on new trading strategies 
Job Requirements: 
• Good Mathematical knowledge (eg. Probability, Optimization, Multivariate Time Series, Stochastic Calculus, etc) 
• Strong programming skills (eg. Python, C++, OO, distributed/ concurrent architect, etc)  
• Preferred relevant experience in data management with good knowledge in one or more data technology (eg. NoSQL, Spark, Flink, Kafka, Hadoop, Tensorflow, etc) 
• Good knowledge in financial product, market and trade life cycle (eg. FX, Equities, Futures, Options, etc) 
• Preferred hand-on data modelling and machine learning experience (eg. ANN, MDP, NLP, etc)

job_description:
Job Description:
• Collaborative Development:
- Work closely with CEO Kevin Hon to apply design thinking in the development process.
- Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute to the overall design and functionality of the application.
• Backend Development:
- Develop and maintain a Node.js and Express.js backend server.
- Implement necessary functions to enhance user onboarding and improve the overall user experience.
• LLM Integration Projects:
- Work on small projects that leverage different Large Language Models (LLMs) such as GPT -4 and Gemini.
- Develop features that help users auto -scope creative projects using these advanced AI models.
• Application Development:
- Use Google's Flutter framework to code the application.
- Follow clean architecture practices to ensure maintainability and scalability of the codebase.
• Project Page Development:
- Use Nest.js to build shareable project pages.
- Ensure these pages effectively communicate project status and updates.
Job Requirements:
• Basic knowledge of Node.js and Express.js for backend development.
• Familiarity with Flutter for cross -platform mobile application development.
• Understanding of Nest.js for building scalable server -side applications.
• Experience or interest in working with Large Language Models (LLMs) such as GPT -4 or Gemini.
• Basic knowledge of clean architecture principles and design thinking methodologies.

job_description:
Blink Gallery, a leading contemporary art gallery, is seeking a talented and tech-savvy 
Art & Technology Intern to join our team. This is an exciting opportunity for students with a strong background in STEM- related fields to contribute to the intersection  of art 
and technology.  
Responsibilities:  
• Assist our artists in developing cutting-edge, technology-driven art projects and 
installations  
• Explore the use of augmented reality (AR) to enhance the visitor experience 
within our art exhibitions  
• Create engaging and visually compelling animated digital content (e.g., motion 
graphics, interactive experiences) to complement the gallery's programming  
• Collaborate with the curatorial and technical teams to ideate, prototype, and implement innovative solutions that push the boundaries of art and technology 
• Research technologies and trends in the art world, and identify opportunities for 
 their application  
• Support the setup, testing, and troubleshooting of art- tech projects to ensure a 
seamless visitor experience  
• Analyze user feedback and data to continuously improve the impact and effectiveness of the gallery's art and technology initiatives  
 
This is a paid internship opportunity with the potential for future employment. If you are excited to contribute to the innovative and cutting- edge projects at BLINK Gallery, 
we encourage you to apply today!  
Job Requirements:  
• Strong technical skills in areas suc h as programming, 3D modeling, motion 
graphics, or AR/VR development  
• Proficient in using various digital design and prototyping tools (e.g., Adobe 
Creative Cloud, Unity, Unreal Engine)  
• Excellent problem-solving and critical- thinking abilities, with a kee n eye for 
detal  
• Passion for the arts and a desire to explore the intersection of creativity and 
technology  
• Exceptional communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work 
effectively with artists and cross -functional teams  
• Familiarity with emerging trends and best practices in art, technology, and user 
experience design

job_description:
As a Business Development Intern, you will play a crucial role in expanding Blissmi's network of health and wellness service partners globally. You will also be responsible for identifying and pursuing potential partnerships with femtech solutions.  Responsibilities:  
• Research and identify potential health and wellness service partners and femtech solutions that align with Blissmi's mission and target market.  
• Conduct thorough research on potential partners, including their services, target audience, and market position.  
• Develop effective outreach strategies to initiate contact with potential partners.  
• Pitch Blissmi's value proposition to potential partners and build strong relationships.  
• Negotiate partnerships and contracts with selected partners.  
• Assist in the onboarding process for new partners.  
• Track and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) related to business development activities.  
• Support the business development team in various administrative tasks.  

Job Requirements:   

• Strong communication and interpersonal skills.  
• Excellent presentation and pitching abilities.  
• Ability to build and maintain strong relationships with partners.  
• Strong research and analytical skills.  
• Attention to detail and organizational skills.  
• Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).  
• Interest in the health and wellness industry and women's health.

job_description:
This role focuses on controlling robotic arms using the Jetson Nano platform, utilizing computer vision techniques like YOLO (You Only Look Once) to enable real -time object detection and decision -making for robotic tasks. 

Key Responsibilities:
• Robotic Arm Control: Design and implement control algorithms for robotic arms, ensuring precise manipulation based on real -time AI feedback from visual inputs.  
• AI & Computer Vision Integration: Develop and integrate AI models (specifically YOLO) for object detection, allowing the robotic arm to interact intelligently with its environment based on camera data.  
• Jetson Nano Development: Leverage the NVIDIA Jetson Nano platform for real-time processing of AI models and robotic control, ensuring optimized performance on embedded hardware.  
• System Testing and Optimization: Perform rigorous testing and fine -tuning of the AI -robotics system to meet performance benchmarks. Identify and resolve any integration issues.  
• Documentation and Communication: Maintain detailed technical documentation of development processes, algorithms, and results. Communicate progress and challenges to stakeholders and team members effectively.  
• Cross -functional Collaboration: Collaborate with AI specialists, hardware engineers, and project managers to ensure cohesive system development and successful deployment.  

Job Rqeuirements: 
• Bachelor’s degree in Robotics, Computer Science, AI, Electrical Engineering, or a related field  
• Solid experience in controlling robotic systems with a focus on AI -driven control mechanisms.  
• Expertise in computer vision techniques, particularly using YOLO and similar AI frameworks.  
• Proficiency in Python, C++, and familiarity with NVIDIA’s Jetson Nano platform.  
• Strong understanding of GPU programming and embedded systems.  
• Experience with ROS (Robot Operating System).  
• Background in machine learning and neural networks.  
• Experience with sensor integration and real -time data processing.  
• Excellent problem -solving skills, creativity, and attention to detail.

• Revamp an online education platform by enhancing the user interface with cutting -edge design principles and user experience (UX) strategies.  
• Leverage data analytics to gain insights from user behavior and preferences, informing targeted improvements.
• Propose and implement innovative modules utilizing emerging technologies such as artificial intelligence and machine learning to personalize learning experiences and optimize content delivery.
• By embracing these technological advancements, the platform aims to create a dynamic and adaptive online education ecosystem that meets the evolving needs of learners with special needs.  

Job Requirements:

job_description:
The successful candidate will be expected to participate in a variety of research and development activities. We acknowledge that an intern's drive is not solely rooted in financial reward but also in a thirst for developing their abilities and acquiring a  breadth of experiences that contribute to their future professional growth. Therefore, we will offer a selection of job tasks from which the candidate can choose their right combination, aligning with both the company's needs and their personal interests.  This includes but not limited to the following set of tasks:  
1. Work in collaboration with the research team on computer vision, natural 
language processing and general machine learning projects, where the student 
is expected to contribute to the development of research ideas.  
2. Work in collaboration with the research and development team, to perform data 
curation tasks, from data acquisition to labelling.  
3. Work closely with the development team to bring new features to life, 
translating designs and wireframes into high -quality code. Work with backend 
development teams to achieve smooth integration between frontend and 
backend components.  
4. Document and disseminate expertise and insights with fellow team members.  
5. Support other company tasks, including pitching and marketing activities.  

Job Requirements:  
1. University students in computer science, engineering or related field.  
2. Proficiency in Python programming and a passion for machine learning and 
artificial intelligence.  
3. Strong problem -solving skills and a good team player.  
4. Possess the ability to work autonomously, demonstrate creativity, and show 
self-motivation with the capacity to adhere to a stringent timeline.  
5. At least 16 hours per week with flexible working time and arrangement.

Passion for education and leveraging technology to improve learning outcomes.

job_description:
We are seeking a passionate and driven AI Development Intern to assist in the development of our AI nutritionist, Eve. This role offers the opportunity to work alongside experienced engineers, data scientists, and nutrition experts to enhance the functionality, accuracy, and user experience of Eve. As an intern, you will contribute to core AI features, support machine learning model optimization, and collaborate on new product features.  

Key Responsibilities:
• Assist in the development, training, and fine -tuning of AI models related to nutrition and user behavior.
• Work with large datasets to improve Eve’s personalization algorithms.
• Collaborate with cross -functional teams to integrate new features and improve user experience.
• Conduct research on nutrition trends, user behavior, and AI advancements to support product innovation.
• Test, debug, and optimize code for efficiency and accuracy.

What We Offer:
• Hands -on experience working on a cutting -edge AI product.
• Mentorship from industry experts.
• Opportunity to impact real-world health and wellness through technology.
• Flexible work hours and a supportive, inclusive work culture.
